File	Title	Description
data_import	Data Import	This report describes the loading of the data into RnBeads.
quality_control	Quality Control	This report performs assay quality validation.
preprocessing	Preprocessing	This report presents the filtering and normalization steps applied to the dataset.
tracks_and_tables	Tracks and Tables	This report provides contains information on exported data, generated genome browser tracks and sample summary tables.
covariate_inference	Covariate Inference	This report infers various sample properties such as surrogate variables and cell type compositions.
exploratory_analysis	Exploratory Analysis	This reports describes sample subgroups, methylation profiles and associations with sample annotations.
differential_methylation	Differential Methylation	This report identifies differentially methylated sites and regions between sample groups.
